entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
